TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type UploadStringCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadStringCompletedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 建立 <xref:System.Net.UploadStringCompletedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式上載字串。
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)]
上傳完成時，會呼叫下列方法。
